name: Beached: Demo
description:
TARS (Text Adventure RPG System) is an open-source interactive fiction engine on Visual Basic. It includes a sentence parser and HUD. Currently there is only a single room, but it will be expanded upon in the future. Also, feel free to use the source code however you want.

For more games by Laughing Coyote Software, go here: https://blancaster45.itch.io/
